name: Protosys
description:
This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Save your homeworld from the evil Protosys Corporation in this '80s home computer inspired space shoot 'em up with a twist - your lasers and health are joined together. The more you shoot, the weaker your ship becomes. Fight and dodge your way through 12 stages filled with deadly Protosys pilots, speeding asteroids and powerful bosses. Only then, can you destroy the asteroid base and free your people.

Controls

Up:    W

Down:    S

Right:    A

Left:    D

Fire:    Left Mouse

Pause:    Pause / Break

Does not work on mobile.
